user.description: This qnap sensor allows getting various statistics from your QNAP NAS.

deprecated_yaml.description:
Configuring QNAP using YAML is being removed.

Your existing YAML configuration has been imported into the UI automatically.

Remove the QNAP YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and restart Home Assistant to fix this issue.
deprecated_yaml.title: The QNAP YAML configuration is being removed
